title: Can we sell Haram Clothes with Images? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: ABD from the US what is the ruling on like for example if you have Haram clothes meaning they have like images of or creatures of creations of Allah and now that you know it's Haram you want to get rid of them is it permissible to sell them or no as long as it's Haram you cannot sell them you either put uh cloth Dy or paint on the image so that it would cover the face features so it removes the Haram or use it to wipe things with it and tear it into pieces and use it in something that's beneficial
